title: Mars Transit in the 4th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 4th house for Capricorn Ascendant, energy and tension concentrate around home, family matters, property, and inner security. You may feel driven to assert control in domestic situations or make decisive moves related to real estate and living arrangements. Irritability can surface at home if emotions are suppressed. This phase favors repairs, restructuring, and disciplined action, provided aggression is managed. Calm authority and practical planning help convert inner restlessness into constructive stability.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Strong need to secure inner stability

sections.title: Career
points: Focus may shift to foundational planning
Drive to organize systems and bases
Avoid carrying domestic stress to work

sections.title: Finance
points: Spending on home repairs or property

closing: This Mars transit urges Capricorn Ascendants to strengthen foundations with discipline. Calm authority turns tension into lasting security.
